H0.text: What is the name of Beethoven's only opera. Fidelio

H1.text: What is the name of Beethoven's only opera. Ariadne

H2.text: What is the name of Beethoven's only opera. Lohengrin

H3.text: What is the name of Beethoven's only opera. Leonore

A4.text: Fidelio (; German: [fiˈdeːlio]), originally titled Leonore, oder Der Triumph der ehelichen Liebe (Leonore, or The Triumph of Marital Love), Op. 72, is the sole opera by German composer Ludwig van Beethoven.

A5.text: Fidelio premiered at Vienna's Theater an der Wien on 20 November 1805.
